page.title: 12HARROW SCHOOLS
page.content: THE{STATE SCHOOL SYSTEM}IN HARROW IS COMPRISED OF FIRST SCHOOLS FOR CHILDREN AGED 5-8YRS:MIDDLE SCHOOLS FOR 8-12YR OLDS AND HIGH SCHOOLS FOR CHILDREN UP TO 16YRS. THERE ARE SEVERAL COMBINED FIRST AND MIDDLE SCHOOLS ,SOME OF WHICH HAVE AN ATTACHED NURSERY UNIT FOR CHILDREN AGED FROM 3-5YRS. IN THE POST STATUTORY SECTOR THERE ARE SIXTH FORM COLLEGES AND COLLEGES OF FURTHER AND HIGHER EDUCATION. A TERTIARY SYSTEM IS PLANNED FOR THE NEAR FUTURE. THERE ARE ALSO MANY{PRIVATE {SCHOOLS}WHICH CATER FOR ALL AGE RANGES. THESE SCHOOLS ARE MOSTLY SITUATED IN LARGE, OLD HOUSES. IN THIS FAIRLY AFFLUENT AREA A CONSIDERABLE NUMBER OF PARENTS OPT FOR PRIVATE EDUCATION AT SOME STAGE IN THEIR CHILD'S DEVELOPMENT.
